newsitem.title: NIGERIA: Nigerian Catholic priest killed by unknown gunmen.
newsitem.headline: Nigerian Catholic priest killed by unknown gunmen.

text.p: A Nigerian Catholic priest serving in the midwestern town of Ogwashi-Uku was shot dead inside his residence in church premises by unknown assailants, the state news agency NAN reported on Tuesday.
Rev Father Emmanuel Isidi, who was head of the St. Patricks parish in the town, was attacked on Monday morning by five assailants who broke into his house after beating and tying up two guards.
Nothing was removed from the residence, NAN said.
Isidi was one of six defendants in a case at Asaba high court over the burial of a corpse in disputed land, NAN said.
